description: Defines aspects of the session or game being played.

num_players.description: The number of players in the session. A player can be a human or a ball machine. Check for the presence of `is_ball_machine` in `player_data`; if it's not present, the player was a human.

session_index.description: Index of this session within the play session (starts at 0)

session_type.description: The type of session being played

title: Session
